name: HVAC Tune-Up Rebate
description: Up to $75 rebate for HVAC tune-up by CA licensed contractor
fullDescription: Silicon Valley Power provides rebates for Santa Clara residents to have their HVAC systems professionally tuned up, improving efficiency and extending equipment life.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $75 rebate for HVAC tune-up
- Must use CA licensed contractor
- Improves system efficiency
- Extends equipment lifespan
- Reduces energy costs
- Ensures proper operation
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Silicon Valley Power customer
2. Schedule HVAC tune-up with licensed contractor
3. Have contractor perform full system check
4. Get receipt with contractor license number
5. Apply online through SVP rebate platform
6. Submit proof of service
keywords: Silicon Valley Power, SVP, HVAC tune-up, Santa Clara, $75, maintenance, AC service, heating service, efficiency
